parameters: A voice is speaking to you over the intercom...
\n<???>Aw, I'm just messing with you. This is a recording.
\n<???>I have designed this place with full intention of keeping people OUT.
\n<???>I take the very fact that you're standing here as a failure. A big one!
\n<???>But... there's nothing I can do about that now.
\n<???>See, I've found a way to let only my loved ones through here...
\n<???>Not to say that anyone has been visiting lately, but... That doesn't matter!
\n<???>Look... to get to me, you'll have to answer riddles. Hard ones!
\n<???>Whoever you are, there's no way you're getting through!
\n<???>Hee-hee... I bet you're REAL scared right now.
\n<???>Well, I'm not gonna hold it in any longer! Here's the first riddle.
\n<???>Well, it doesn't matter if you're ready or not!
\n<???>"This someone is my grandma's child... and my grandpapa's child as well!"
\n<???>Input your answer in the keypad to the left of the door!!!
\n<???>If you mess it up... I'm gonna kick you out!
\n<???>If you're listening to this message, it means you miserably crawled back after getting kicked out of my domain...
\n<???>Well... I guess you're not gonna stop trying to get through.
\n<???>"This someone is my grandma's child... and my grandpapa's child as well!"
\n<???>Just kidding! You really thought I was gonna use the same riddle over again!?
\n<???>If I did that, you could've looked the answer up on the internet!
\n<???>Or you could've guessed correctly after getting it wrong the first time!
\n<???>No... what I'm gonna do instead is give you a NEW RIDDLE!
\n<???>"My painting and my doll cost $1500 in total."
\n<???>"The painting costs $1,000 more than the doll."
\n<???>Now... How much does my doll cost?
\n<???>Input your answer in the keypad to the left of the door!!!
\n<???>And remember... If you mess it up... I'm gonna kick you out!
It appears that, after getting the wrong answer twice, the intercom has run out of recordings... And the door unlocked itself.
You decide to swallow your pride and move on.
\n<???>"This someone is my grandma's child... and my grandpapa's child as well!"
\n<???>Input your answer in the keypad to the left of the door!!!
\n<???>If you mess it up... I'm gonna kick you out!
\n<???>"My painting and my doll cost $1500 in total."
\n<???>"The painting costs $1,000 more than the doll."
\n<???>Now... How much does my doll cost?
\n<???>Input your answer in the keypad to the left of the door!!!
\n<???>If you mess it up... I'm gonna kick you out!
As you recall, the riddle went like this...
"There is someone who is my grandma's child, and my grandpapa's child as well!"
It appears your answer was wrong...
\n<???>But you won't get through the next room!
\n<???>You'll find it behind the big door.
It appears your answer was wrong...

"The painting costs $1,000 more than the doll."
Would you like to enter an answer into the keypad?

\n<???>You'll find it behind the big door.
